| [a](/wiki/Repeat_previous_command "Repeat previous command") |                                        | [c](/wiki/Quit "Quit")         |                                        |                            | [d](/wiki/Kick "Kick")                         |                        | [o](/wiki/Overview "Overview")       |                            | [p](/wiki/Repeat_previous_messages "Repeat previous messages") |                                                                                               | [r](/wiki/Redraw_screen "Redraw screen") |                                | [t](/wiki/Teleportation "Teleportation") |                                                                                               |                                                                                         | [\[](/wiki/Esc "Esc")                                            |                                                | [Ctrl](/wiki/Ctrl "Ctrl")                                         |                                                                    |                                                            |   |

Commands in (parentheses) are available only if [number\_pad](/wiki/Options#number_pad "Options") is enabled; the directions given assume it is set to 1 or 2 (not the phone-style keypad layout). Commands in *italics* are available only in [wizard mode](/wiki/Wizard_mode "Wizard mode").

|    | Key                                                                                                                                  |    | Key + Shift                                                                                 | Key + Alt                                                               |     | Key + Ctrl                                                                                                   |
| -- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | --- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| a  | [Apply](/wiki/Apply "Apply")                                                                                                         | A  | [Take off](/wiki/Take_off "Take off") multiple                                              | [Adjust](/wiki/Adjust "Adjust")                                         | SOH | Repeat previous command                                                                                      |
| b  | [Move](/wiki/Movement "Movement") [southwest](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                                             | B  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [southwest](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                               |                                                                         | STX | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [southwest](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                                |
| c  | [Close door](/wiki/Door#Closing_doors "Door")                                                                                        | C  | [Call](/wiki/Call "Call")                                                                   | [Chat](/wiki/Chat "Chat")                                               | ETX | [Quit](/wiki/Quit "Quit")                                                                                    |
| d  | [Drop](/wiki/Drop "Drop")                                                                                                            | D  | [Drop multiple](/wiki/Drop "Drop")                                                          | [Dip](/wiki/Dip "Dip")                                                  | EOT | [Kick](/wiki/Kick "Kick")                                                                                    |
| e  | [Eat](/wiki/Eat "Eat")                                                                                                               | E  | [Engraving](/wiki/Engraving "Engraving")                                                    | [Enhance](/wiki/Enhance "Enhance")                                      | ENQ | *Search room*                                                                                                |
| f  | [Fire](/wiki/Firing "Firing")                                                                                                        | F  | [Fight](/wiki/Fight "Fight")                                                                | [Force](/wiki/Force "Force")                                            | ACK | *Map level*                                                                                                  |
| g  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G")                                                                                                               | G  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G")                                                                      |                                                                         | BEL | *Create monster*                                                                                             |
| h  | [Move](/wiki/Movement "Movement") [west](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn") / ([Help](/wiki/Help_\(in-game\) "Help (in-game)"))              | H  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [west](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                    |                                                                         | BS  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [west](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                                     |
| i  | [Inventory](/wiki/Inventory "Inventory")                                                                                             | I  | [Inventory specific types](/wiki/Inventory "Inventory")                                     | [Invoke](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke")                                         | HT  | *Identify*                                                                                                   |
| j  | [Move](/wiki/Movement "Movement") [south](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn") / ([Jump](/wiki/Jump "Jump"))                                   | J  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [south](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                   | [Jump](/wiki/Jump "Jump")                                               | LF  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [south](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                                    |
| k  | [Move](/wiki/Movement "Movement") [north](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn") / ([Kick](/wiki/Kick "Kick"))                                   | K  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [north](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                   |                                                                         | VT  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [north](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                                    |
| l  | [Move](/wiki/Movement "Movement") [east](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn") / ([Loot](/wiki/Loot "Loot"))                                    | L  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [east](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                    | [Loot](/wiki/Loot "Loot")                                               | FF  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [east](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn") / (Redraw screen)                                   |
| m  | [Move only](/wiki/M "M")                                                                                                             | M  | [Move only](/wiki/M "M")                                                                    | [Monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster")                                      | CR  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [south](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                                    |
| n  | [Move](/wiki/Movement "Movement") [southeast](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn") / ([Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix")) | N  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [southeast](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn") / ([Name](/wiki/Name "Name")) | [Name](/wiki/Name "Name")                                               | SO  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [southeast](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn") / ([Annotate](/wiki/Annotate "Annotate"))      |
| o  | [Open](/wiki/Open "Open")                                                                                                            | O  | [Options](/wiki/Options "Options")                                                          | [Offer](/wiki/Offer "Offer")                                            | SI  | [Overview](/wiki/Overview "Overview")                                                                        |
| p  | [Pay bill](/wiki/Shop#Normal_transactions "Shop")                                                                                    | P  | [Put on](/wiki/Put_on "Put on")                                                             | [Pray](/wiki/Prayer "Prayer")                                           | DLE | [Repeat previous messages](/wiki/Repeat_previous_messages "Repeat previous messages")                        |
| q  | [Quaff](/wiki/Quaff "Quaff")                                                                                                         | Q  | [Quiver](/wiki/Quiver "Quiver")                                                             | [Quit](/wiki/Quit "Quit")                                               | DC1 | Resume pause                                                                                                 |
| r  | [Read](/wiki/Read "Read")                                                                                                            | R  | [Remove](/wiki/Remove "Remove")                                                             | [Rub](/wiki/Rub "Rub")                                                  | DC2 | [Redraw screen](/wiki/Redraw_screen "Redraw screen")                                                         |
| s  | [Search](/wiki/Search "Search")                                                                                                      | S  | [Save](/wiki/Save "Save")                                                                   | [Sit](/wiki/Sit "Sit")                                                  | DC3 | Pause                                                                                                        |
| t  | [Throw](/wiki/Throw "Throw")                                                                                                         | T  | [Take off](/wiki/Take_off "Take off")                                                       | [Turn undead](/wiki/Turn_undead "Turn undead")                          | DC4 | [Teleport](/wiki/Teleport "Teleport")                                                                        |
| u  | [Move](/wiki/Movement "Movement") [northeast](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn") / ([Untrap](/wiki/Untrap "Untrap"))                         | U  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [northeast](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                               | [Untrap](/wiki/Untrap "Untrap")                                         | NAK | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [northeast](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                                |
| v  | [Version](/wiki/Version "Version")                                                                                                   | V  | [Game history](/wiki/Game_history "Game history")                                           | [Version](/wiki/Version "Version")                                      | SYN | *[Levelport](/wiki/Levelport "Levelport")*                                                                   |
| w  | [Wield](/wiki/Wield "Wield")                                                                                                         | W  | [Wear](/wiki/Wear "Wear")                                                                   | [Wipe](/wiki/Wipe "Wipe")                                               | ETB | *[Wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish")*                                                                                  |
| x  | [Swap weapons](/wiki/Swap_weapons "Swap weapons")                                                                                    | X  | [Twoweapon](/wiki/Twoweapon "Twoweapon")                                                    |                                                                         | CAN | [Base attributes](/wiki/Base_attributes "Base attributes") *and [intrinsics](/wiki/Intrinsics "Intrinsics")* |
| y  | [Move](/wiki/Movement "Movement") [northwest](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                                             | Y  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [northwest](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                               |                                                                         | EM  | [Go mode](/wiki/G "G") [northwest](/wiki/Yuhjklbn "Yuhjklbn")                                                |
| z  | [Zap](/wiki/Zap "Zap")                                                                                                               | Z  | [Spellcast](/wiki/Spellcasting "Spellcasting")                                              |                                                                         | SUB | [Shell escape](/wiki/Shell_escape "Shell escape")                                                            |
| 1  | [Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix") / (Move southwest)                                                           | !  | [Shell escape](/wiki/Shell_escape "Shell escape")                                           |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| 2  | [Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix") / (Move south)                                                               | @  | Toggle [Autopickup](/wiki/Autopickup "Autopickup")                                          |                                                                         | NUL |                                                                                                              |
| 3  | [Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix") / (Move southeast)                                                           | #  | [Extended command](/wiki/Extended_command "Extended command")                               |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| 4  | [Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix") / (Move west)                                                                | $  | [Purse](/wiki/Purse "Purse")                                                                |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| 5  | [Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix") / ([Go mode](/wiki/G "G"))                                                   | %  |                                                                                             |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| 6  | [Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix") / (Move east)                                                                | ^  | [Trap ID](/wiki/Trap_ID "Trap ID")                                                          |                                                                         | RS  |                                                                                                              |
| 7  | [Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix") / (Move northwest)                                                           | &  | Identify [command](/wiki/Command "Command")                                                 |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| 8  | [Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix") / (Move north)                                                               | \* | List currently equipped items                                                               |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| 9  | [Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix") / (Move east)                                                                | (  | List currently used tools                                                                   |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| 0  | [Numeric prefix](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix") / ([Inventory](/wiki/Inventory "Inventory"))                                 | )  | List currently wielded weapons                                                              |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| '  |                                                                                                                                      | "  | List currently worn amulet                                                                  |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| -  |                                                                                                                                      | \_ | [Travel](/wiki/Travel "Travel")                                                             |                                                                         | US  |                                                                                                              |
| \[ | List currently worn armor                                                                                                            | {  |                                                                                             |                                                                         | ESC |                                                                                                              |
| ,  | [Pick up](/wiki/Pick_up "Pick up")                                                                                                   | <  | Go up                                                                                       |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| .  | [Rest](/wiki/Rest "Rest")                                                                                                            | >  | Go down                                                                                     |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| /  | [What is](/wiki/What_is "What is")                                                                                                   | ?  | [Help](/wiki/Help_\(in-game\) "Help (in-game)")                                             | [List all extended commands](/wiki/Extended_command "Extended command") | DEL |                                                                                                              |
| ;  | [Far look](/wiki/Far_look "Far look")                                                                                                | :  | [Near look](/wiki/Near_look "Near look")                                                    |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |
| \\ | [List discoveries](/wiki/Discoveries "Discoveries")                                                                                  | \| |                                                                                             |                                                                         | FS  |                                                                                                              |
| =  | List currently worn rings                                                                                                            | +  | List & reorder spells                                                                       |                                                                         |     |                                                                                                              |

See also [menu controls](/wiki/Menu_controls "Menu controls").

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")
html:
Commands (by key)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Keyboard commands
~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ = +
Q W E R T Y U I O P { } |
q w e r t y u i o p [ ] \
A S D F G H J K L : "
a s d f g h j k l ; '
Z X C V B N M < > ?
z x c v b n m , . /
q w e r t u i o p Alt
a s d f j l Alt
c v n m ? Alt
A C R T O Alt
a c d o p r t [ Ctrl

Commands in (parentheses) are available only if number_pad is enabled; the directions given assume it is set to 1 or 2 (not the phone-style keypad layout). Commands in italics are available only in wizard mode.

Key Key + Shift Key + Alt Key + Ctrl
a Apply A Take off multiple Adjust SOH Repeat previous command
b Move southwest B Go mode southwest STX Go mode southwest
c Close door C Call Chat ETX Quit
d Drop D Drop multiple Dip EOT Kick
e Eat E Engraving Enhance ENQ Search room
f Fire F Fight Force ACK Map level
g Go mode G Go mode BEL Create monster
h Move west / (Help) H Go mode west BS Go mode west
i Inventory I Inventory specific types Invoke HT Identify
j Move south / (Jump) J Go mode south Jump LF Go mode south
k Move north / (Kick) K Go mode north VT Go mode north
l Move east / (Loot) L Go mode east Loot FF Go mode east / (Redraw screen)
m Move only M Move only Monster CR Go mode south
n Move southeast / (Numeric prefix) N Go mode southeast / (Name) Name SO Go mode southeast / (Annotate)
o Open O Options Offer SI Overview
p Pay bill P Put on Pray DLE Repeat previous messages
q Quaff Q Quiver Quit DC1 Resume pause
r Read R Remove Rub DC2 Redraw screen
s Search S Save Sit DC3 Pause
t Throw T Take off Turn undead DC4 Teleport
u Move northeast / (Untrap) U Go mode northeast Untrap NAK Go mode northeast
v Version V Game history Version SYN Levelport
w Wield W Wear Wipe ETB Wish
x Swap weapons X Twoweapon CAN Base attributes and intrinsics
y Move northwest Y Go mode northwest EM Go mode northwest
z Zap Z Spellcast SUB Shell escape
1 Numeric prefix / (Move southwest) ! Shell escape
2 Numeric prefix / (Move south) @ Toggle Autopickup NUL
3 Numeric prefix / (Move southeast) # Extended command
4 Numeric prefix / (Move west) $ Purse
5 Numeric prefix / (Go mode) %
6 Numeric prefix / (Move east) ^ Trap ID RS
7 Numeric prefix / (Move northwest) & Identify command
8 Numeric prefix / (Move north) * List currently equipped items
9 Numeric prefix / (Move east) ( List currently used tools
0 Numeric prefix / (Inventory) ) List currently wielded weapons
' " List currently worn amulet
- _ Travel US
[ List currently worn armor { ESC
, Pick up < Go up
. Rest > Go down
/ What is ? Help List all extended commands DEL
; Far look : Near look
\ List discoveries | FS
= List currently worn rings + List & reorder spells

See also menu controls.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Commands_(by_key)&oldid=169025"
